attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
We can not accept petitions about individual circumstances. We suggest you get in contact with a group that helps women in your situation such as Women's Aid (http://www.womensaid.org.uk). 

If you believe the police are not taking your claims seriously you can also contact the Independent Police Complaints Commission (http://www.ipcc.gov.uk)
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
